name: Bone Magic
summary: Your connection to your iruxi ancestors manifests as a simple primal spell that you cast using a fragment of an ancestor's bones.
description:
Your connection to your iruxi ancestors manifests as a simple primal spell that you cast using a fragment of an ancestor's bones. Choose one cantrip from the primal spell list. You can cast this cantrip as a primal innate spell at will, and it's heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.Traits

Lizardfolk: These reptilian humanoids, also known as iruxi, are extremely adaptable and patient.
